title: Yahoo Answers 2.0? The forgotten tech giant promises to help you understand the memes in your feed
description: Consider this your every-few-years reminder that Yahoo exists. And is still kinda big, somehow! Depending on the source, it’s the No. 6 or No. 8 website in the U.S. and in the top 20 globally; two of its subdomains, news.yahoo.com and finance.yahoo.com, are each among the 15 largest news sites in America. And it’s still...
